snippet.title: A Book of Beasts and Buddies Trailer
snippet.description:
A Book of Beasts and Buddies is an interactive bestiary of curious creatures for you to befriend. Every page is a miniature choose your own adventure.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/959750/A_Book_of_Beasts_and_Buddies/
Itch.io: https://squiddershins.itch.io/beast-buds
